## This room will be closed and archived.
** @/all Please move discussion of this topic to our forum, or to one of the official Free Code Camp chat rooms: http://forum.freecodecamp.com/t/free-code-camp-official-chat-rooms/19390**

Maybe try to organize something through the [Facebook group](https://www.facebook.com/groups/free.code.camp.albuquerque/). I'm sure there are people that want to meet up.

cool. Do you know of other meetups in town? I haven't found much that is JS specific. and i hear ya on time. I wish I had more. Thought it might be cool to have a codecamp meet up or something, maybe monthly.
I would like to attend meetups although I'm pretty busy right now with a startup.
I'm on HTML/CSS although I know a most of the topics with the exception of JQuery and Angular.
the official name was Bonfire: Title Case a Sentence.  The thing took me several days
no biggie if you're happier flying solo.
querque is small, thinking it might be good to start a network of JS folks
and I'm just asking/talking about a general meet up
hey @dabowheel - just finished the bonfire sentence capitalization. you?
@GRALTOS which lessons are you on? Which lesson do you need help on?
@dabowheel it might only be us. not sure. I'd really be interested to chat with another camper and help/get some help on some of this stuff.
Hey! Anyone interested in meeting up?
